name: W's Bar And Grill
address: 7001 Amboy Rd, Staten Island, NY 10307, USA

reviews.text: Absolutely love W‚Äôs Bar and Grill! Between the great food, wonderful staff, and welcoming environment, it‚Äôs a place I‚Äôll definitely return to and highly recommend.

The food was definitely comforting! Definitely delicious!! You are going to want to make adjustments to your drinks(alcoholic or not). The service was awesome! The atmosphere is cozy! I would absolutely recommend!

Ws is a great place to watch a game or meet friends.  The food is delicious, the drinks are superb!  Bar Tenders and severs make you feel like family.  When in Tottenville this is our go to spot !  Highly recommended!
This place is awesome! Beautifully decorated and nice and cozy! Great food and fantastic service! Highly recommend!!
The food was good the service was excellent especially Tuesday and Thursday 11 a.m ü´°üòãüòò
Food was good, service was good, definitely would go back. I got a cheese burger medium rare and was cooked perfect. The fries were nice and crispy.
Horrible food. Better with the last chef.
Dry burgers, tasteless wings. Not as good as it use to be
Dry tasteless food. Heard it used to be good but haven‚Äôt had good food yet.
Cool neighborhood bar with mostly locals. Has a good kitchen too

Because your menu was so limited WE went next door and brought pizza slices back sat at YOUR bar and had cocktails.  The bartender was so nervous the OWNER would be all over HER cams?  Imagine?  She should be awarding her staff for their CONSCIENTIOUSNESS in CARING for HER customers and NOT worrying about having a slice.  What happened to CARING about EACH other‚Äôs wellbeing?  Your staff is professional.  They are NOT competitors.  Professional rapport?  How about having a professional relationship?
Been coming here for years, awesome owner and great staff. Can‚Äôt beat it. Beer is cold people are genuine.

First time ordered from W‚Äôs and very disappointed.  The order was placed outside door with no indication it was there, no text no knock on door.  The items ordered were not good especially the hamburger platter, the meat was not a fresh chop meat burger but a frozen flat hardly cooked burger.  Will not make that mistake again with this restaurant,$75 for a meal that had to discard and the shrimp in a basket was so tiny shrimps all bread
The service is great bartenders are great.
Our server/bartender was and is always the best!  Very attentive! We enjoy coming here and come as often as we can. Keep of the good work W‚Äôs!

love the staff, service is great. The negative is the manager yells at the staff and bartender in front of customers which is very unprofessional and created a negative environment and therefore a negative experience. very unprofessional.
Good food and brews.
The cheesesteak egg rolls are to die for. My absolute favorite. The kitchen is open late during the week unlike most restaurants in the area which is amazing.
Delicious food in a nice atmosphere. It's great to have a spot like this in Tottenville.

The place was really nice, great staff, no waiting. The burgers were incredible and the fries were beyond my expectations!

Will go again!
I hope the new owners change the food!!! I have to drive across S.I to Duffy s for a great burger & wings. I am hoping for big changes with the food!!
Lots of fun, good burgers and more
Great food
Cozy neighborhood bar. Nice food and drinks. Always, always packed üòä‚Ä¶
Good burger, plenty of TVs
Great burgers!!!
Love my burger
Great food very family oriented great staff
Great food and atmosphere
Great service and they open late!
Chill spot
The best for as long as I can remember
Great staff. Best French Onion soup in town. Great burgers, and the fries are cut fresh. Can't beat it if you wanna sit at a bar and have a burger.

I was here last weekend to have a late dinner (arround 8:30). Me and a friend sat at one of the small tables near the bar. We were ignored for about 15 minutes before the waitress came over and took our drink and appetizer order. We didn't‚Ä¶

My 1st experience....great staff nicki,Keri
Enjoyed my deluxe burger
And great conversation
Would not hesitate to return
And recommend to all good neighbors
Very homey
CHAZ
Came here for a game with some friends. Plenty of big screens to watch the games. Friendly bartender and server. Drinks are reasonable and the bar food was pretty good.
Nice place with good lunch but they stop serving too early.
always a pleasure, relaxed, friendly and best burgers but you might have to expand soon
Always enjoy the food and friendship thereat. A great place to mingle.
Great Burgers. Fast service. Nice bar.
I love the pastrami and corned beef sandwiches here friendly staff
Excellent a must stop if your in tottenville great burgers
Great food. Great atmosphere. Great crowd.
Stopped for a couple drinks. Good decor. Nice crowd.
Still a great local bar. Nicely refurbished.
Good friendly place, I love to go for lunch
Great people. Great service..clean safe place
Lady was very nasty and food was okay. Nothing special !
